title: Do-it-all with Tout Terrain’s Nolita GT Urban Commuter
content:
Straight outta Germany comes a new commuter bike from Tout Terrain. Meet the Nolita GT, a sporty, drop-bar commuter bike that looks versatile enough to do more than just a commute to the office.

Known for thier touring and travel bikes, Tout Terrain also has a collection of eBikes, city commuters, along with components and accessories.

Their latest offering, the Nolita GT was named after a “hip NYC neighborhood” where “urban lifestyle meets bike culture”. The Nolita GT combines all of Tout Terrain’s experience to provide the rider with an urban explorer that’s ready for the city streets… and maybe even beyond.

Let’s take a look.

Tout Terrain’s Nolita GT

The Nolita GT frame is made with Tout Terrain proprietary, 4130 chromoly, butted Stratocom tubset. These tubes are “load-optimized” and are indvidually selected for each model to try to achieve the perfect balance between weight and durability.

700c wheels equipped with Vittoria all-raod tires allow riders to take the turn down the unpaved path on the way to work or use it for some gavel griding on the weekend.

Shipped with all-weather fenders, a convenient rear rack, front adn rear lights and the versatile All-Road Fork II that has multiple mounting points for bags, bidons and more.

Pedal power for the Nolita is provided by a Shimano GRX 1x or 2x drivetrain. You can pick one of the three different Nolita GT models, or try the available custom build option. Custom builds allow the customer to select their choice of color, components, and accessories.

Nolita GT Features

  • Resilient Stratocrom steel frame
  • Tout Terrain All-Road Fork II with threaded mounting bosses
  • Shimano GRX 1X/2X drivetrain options
  • 700c wheelset with Vittoria Terreno Zero gravel tires
  • All-road kit with mudguards, front and rear lights
  • Sturdy rear rack for daily use and light touring
